completion_data.completion_summary: Added structured Progress subsections to implementation plan phases across 5 documentation files. Defined format with session headers, action verbs (Added/Fixed/Completed/Removed/Refactored/Attempted), outcome tracking for Lean tasks, and no-progress session documentation.
